gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nuggets 103, Heat 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nuggets defeated the Heat, 103-97. Michael Porter Jr. recorded 30 points, 11 rebounds, and three assists for the Nuggets, with Nikola Jokic adding 18 points, 11 rebounds, and seven assists in the victory. Bam Adebayo tallied 22 points, eight rebounds, and three assists for the Heat in the losing effort. The Nuggets improve to 41-19, while the Heat fall to 33-26.
